violations.description: Ensure ARIA attributes are used as described in the specification of the element's role
violations.help: ARIA attributes must be used as specified for the element's role

nodes.html: <input id="ot-bnr-grp-id-BG107" type="checkbox" aria-checked="false" disabled="true" class="category-switch-handler" name="ot-bnr-grp-id-BG107" data-optanongroupid="BG107" checked="" aria-labelledby="ot-bnr-hdr-id-BG107">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  Remove aria-checked, or set it to "true" to match the real checkbox state

violations.description: Ensure that every form element has a visible label and is not solely labeled using hidden labels, or the title or aria-describedby attributes
violations.help: Form elements should have a visible label

nodes.html: <input type="text" title="Søk på Atea" name="q" class="search-query" placeholder="Søk etter artikler og tjenester.">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  Only title used to generate label for form element

violations.description: Ensure the banner landmark is at top level
violations.help: Banner landmark should not be contained in another landmark

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The banner landmark is contained in another landmark.

violations.description: Ensure the main landmark is at top level
violations.help: Main landmark should not be contained in another landmark

nodes.html: Vi bygger Norge med IT
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The main landmark is contained in another landmark.

violations.description: Ensure the document has at most one main landmark
violations.help: Document should not have more than one main landmark

nodes.html: <div class="page-body" role="main" aria-label="Atea - Norges største IT-selskap">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Document has more than one main landmark

violations.description: Ensure all page content is contained by landmarks
violations.help: All page content should be contained by landmarks

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Some page content is not contained by landmarks

nodes.html: Chat med oss
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Some page content is not contained by landmarks
